comment: Mamta ghar pr diye jala rahi hai..
amr:
# ::snt Mamta ghar pr diye jala rahi hai..
(p / person
      :mode expressive
      :name (n / name
            :op1 "Mamta"
            :op2 "Ghar")
      :mod (p2 / pr-diye
            :mod (h / hai)))

# ::snt She fights with people
(f / fight-01
      :ARG0 (s / she)
      :ARG1 (p / person))

# ::snt Mamta does Chandi Path
(d / do-02
      :ARG0 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Mamta"))
      :ARG1 (p2 / path
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Chandi"
                  :op2 "Path")))

comment: Mamta ko desh ki jemedaari di gai hai, achha huaa Rahul Gandhi nahi bola aapne.
amr:
# ::snt Mamta ko desh ki jemedaari di gai hai, achha huaa Rahul Gandhi nahi bola aapne.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / amr-unintelligible
            :value "Mamta")
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (d / desh-00
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Jemedaari")))
            :op2 (g / gai
                  :mode imperative
                  :polarity -
                  :domain y)
            :op3 (a3 / achha
                  :mode expressive)
            :op4 (a4 / achha
                  :mode expressive)
            :op5 (b / bola
                  :mode expressive
                  :domain (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Rahul"
                              :op2 "Gandhi")))))

# ::snt Fake politician this!
(t / this
      :mode expressive
      :ARG1-of (f / fake-02)
      :mod (p / politician))

comment: You can't compare the PM to state CM. Responsibilities are very different. Besides, elections are in Bengal, if Mamata doesn't fight the election for TMC, who will? If BJP cannot fight any election without Namo, it is their weakness.
amr:
# ::snt You can't compare the PM to state CM. Responsibilities are very different. Besides, elections are in Bengal, if Mamata doesn't fight the election for TMC, who will? If BJP cannot fight any election without Namo, it is their weakness.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (c / compare-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                                    :mod (p3 / prime))))
                  :ARG2 (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (m3 / minister
                                    :mod (c2 / chief)
                                    :mod (e / executive))))))
      :snt2 (d / differ-02
            :ARG1 (r / responsible-03)
            :degree (v / very))
      :snt3 (e2 / elect-01
            :location (s / state
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Bengal"))
            :mod (b / besides)
            :condition (f / fight-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Mamata"))
                  :ARG2 (e3 / elect-01)
                  :beneficiary (p6 / political-party
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "TMC")))
            :ARG1 (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt4 (w / weak-02
            :ARG1 p6
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "BJP"))
      :condition (p7 / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (f2 / fight-01
                  :ARG0 (p8 / person
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Namo"))
                  :ARG2 (e4 / elect-01
                        :mod (a2 / any)))))
